评论详情: This suit is cute and very comfortable. I love it, it fits perfectly!

评论概述: Solid quality but made for short torsos
评论详情: It is what it says, but it's definitely designed for a shorter torso. If you're short legs with a long torso like me, there's just no way. It's a bummer because I really like the style! Getting a bigger size would be too much room in the top and lose support. Bummed to have to find something else now.
I bought 2 in different colors. Fits true to size, only thing I didn’t like is legs do ride up if walking. In the pool great.

I’m unsure if this is supposed to be a maternity suit or not? I’m not pregnant and love this suit. I get so many compliments on it because of its adorable retro/classy look. The way it fits on the stomach is amazing too because it hides bloat or basically anything on your tummy you’d rather not share with the public. Big fan.
Makes me shapely
This swimming suit is beautiful it's perfectly amazing retro piece
It’s a cute swimsuit, and it minimized the bust area (good or bad, depending on your body).
Love the polka dots! Doesn’t fit yet. I need swimsuits for my aerobics class.

Cute and comfortable. What more could you ask for in a bathing suit? Plus hides the tummy a bit and is flattering. I kind of don’t want to recommend this because it’s a unique style and easy to spot if someone was twinning me at the pool but heck, let’s all look and feel great by the pool together. Jump in, the water is fine.
Very pretty. Fit great. Tucks you in nicely.

I really like the swimsuit overall. I do however feel like the leg holes and the chest area ran a little small. I sized up and it felt really comfortable everywhere but kept rolling on my leg sometimes. But with 3 kids it was wonderful not to have to pick swimsuit out of my butt every 5 seconds.
Fits perfectly. Looks modern and nice. I loved it
This has faded so much I rarely wear it. The seams have ripped out. This one is grape colored. I have a black one that’s great.
I’m chunky and had many compliments on this suit.  But I wish the padding was removable.

I'm 5'7 and 188lbs. This fits so well, just a teeny small at the bust. I'm bigger up top, 38c (some say d). But the halter keeps it secure! I don't think it will last very many years with the seams a bit weak but you'll get your money's worth. It's beautiful!  Will add a photo later
I bought my wife some swimsuits this summer, and this is by far her favorite. It fits really well, and if you have a little belly? It's very hard to tell. Will definitely be buying again
Loved this so much.. so many compliments and sexy too get itttt.! Tummy control, has stretch to it, it’s comfort, good quality
I Like the swimsuit. However, it rises a lot between my thighs and the only tummy control is how you place the ruffles.
This bathing suit holds you in place! Getting anyone in a different color. Love it.
I love it with boyshort bottom,just what I was looking for it fits just right.id recommended this product to other's.

评论用户: Try to size very cute. Good material.
评论详情: Very cute , great material and true to size.

This is such a flattering swimsuit. I usually hate one pieces because they accent all the wrong things and never fit quite right but this one is different. It tames the belly pooch, accents curves, and keeps you covered in all the right places. It also doesn’t ride up constantly giving you a wedgie. I get so many compliments on how cute it is!
Love this bathing suit! Very flattering
This was just what I had been looking for! A little retro-looking and super flattering. It sucks in my belly and I love the boy shorts.
Cute suit and comfy but the shorts roll up in the pool

评论概述: Love this but the pink fades unevenly.
评论详情: Fits really nice! Worth your money.  I have it with the black and white top - looks great!  I also have it with the pink top.  The pink top fits great but unfortunately it faded in chlorine.  It faded unevenly as well.  I would like to get the polka dot one… wish they would exchange my pink defective one for the polka dot one.
I got this for my 13 year old daughter.  She loves it.  It fits well but isn’t too revealing like many two piece and some 1 piece ones are.
Finally a truly great looking modest swimwear. I took a star off coz there is really no tummy control to speak of. But overall it looks really pretty on without looking matronly.

Suit style is cute.  Torso length for someone 6’0 tall was little short.  Material quality was just average.  I prefer a suit with some hold and slightly thicker material as I feel it is more flattering and forgiving.

This swimwear is a fantastic find! It combines the coverage of a bodysuit with the functionality of a swimsuit, making it perfect for beach trips. I chose this style specifically to address concerns about sagging in the lower area and to cover my inner thighs, and it exceeded my expectations.  The design effectively hides problem areas while providing excellent coverage, allowing me to enjoy the beach with confidence. I was initially worried about the swimsuit riding up in the front while walking, but it stayed in place perfectly.  If you’re looking for swimwear that offers great coverage and comfort, I highly recommend this option. It’s a great solution for anyone looking to feel confident and stylish at the beach.
I've only wore this swimsuit about 5 times and the stitching has started to come undone. Doesn't seem like it'll last too long.
This is so cute!  I wear a med and it runs true to size!  I love it!

I liked the suit, I would suggest another piece across front, as in authentic vintage suits. I returned it because the swim party was off, but I decided to reorder because I liked it enough. Only, in a larger size; the bust was too small (I'm a D+)

After less than one year I threw this out because the fabric thinned to the point of being see-through around my backside. Also, I always hated that the fabric rode up around my legs. That the interior lining is a different color (white) makes the ride up even worse.

评论概述: Super cute but lacks good support on top
评论详情: This suit is adorable. I wanted to keep it but unfortunately the top of the suit did not provide adequate support in the chest. (I would not have felt comfortable walking on the beach or at the pool jangling around!)  I bought a large; according to their sizing chart my hips and waist were large but my bust was medium (36D). It's possible the smaller size would have been perfect in the bust, but then the hips and rear definitely would have been too tight.  Got to say though, super comfy swimsuit option. Very old school and classic. Would highly recommend, hope it fits!
I got an XL based on the size chart and it was very loose on me. I'm keeping it to have, but size down.

Super comfy not restricting held up perfectly in the water the style is flattering for those mom bods like me out there I love the colors and will definitely get a couple more different ones. I'm 5'3" & 148 lbs and this was very comfortable. When we were finish with our river run I just threw a bathing suit "smock" over the top and we went out to eat feeling presentable enough to carry on without having to change clothes.
I sent back because its to small the sizes run small make sure to get a bigger size !! I ended up with another bathing suit so i didnt need this one anymore but i did like it very nice !!!👍

评论概述: Great suit! Vintage glamour and great coverage
评论详情: I have this bathing suit in three colors. It is a great bathing suit for the money! I always get compliments on it and people want to know where to buy one. The legs don't ride up. Tummy control isn't super great, but adequate. The bust is well padded. Suits have held up well. The solid black one is my favorite, followed by the black polka dot one. Classic Hollywood vintage movie star look. So nice to have my rear end covered, and as a plus you don't have to worry about shaving your bikini line. I am 5'7" and 136 lbs and normally wear a size 6, but am fairly busty, so I purchased a medium. If I had a smaller chest, a small would probably be a slightly better fit on me. I'm back to order suit #4 in red.

So, I saw another review from a lady who was as tall as me and about 10lbs lighter and she looked great in the XL. I bought the xxl and glad I did. It fits nicely, I do feel like I have to have the top pulled and tied real tight to keep the girl up and looking decent in to but it ties up well. I’ve lost 20lbs so far and am still loosing weight and I feel confident that this will still fit well as i do, probably at another 20lbs before it would be just too big to wear. The shorts part comes down to a nice boy short and covers my leg chub up in a flattering way too. Haven’t worn it in the water yet, but I don’t see where it would be a problem after being wet.

This is the first one piece suite I’ve worn in about 3 decades. Great choice! It’s very cute and comfortable. However, that rear view is not very flattering. Nothing a cover up or swim shorts can’t fix.

评论概述: Thin fabric, little support, not great
评论详情: I promised myself I would write a review on this. I wanted a bathing suit where I could avoid shaving my bikini line and be kind of cute. This suit runs small. It is quite thin for a bathing suit. There is zero support on the cups, which makes no sense because this bathing was basically made for post partum moms. Not pleased but so desperate, I wore it any way, which I regret.

This bathing suit is on point and exactly what I was looking for!  The fit is fabulous, quality great for the price and not too short on the boy shorts which so many of these are.  It is so flattering!!!  Buy it, you will thank me later.

As having a bigger chest and a smaller waist i’ve always struggled with finding a balance with clothes to fit both of them perfectly and this swimsuit does just that! I order a medium and i was skeptical the chest part wasn’t going to fit but it does (I’m a triple D!). Very good purchase

评论概述: Loved this bathing suit until I didn't.
评论详情: I loved this bathing suit but after a couple of months the dye started washing out. I bought the pink one.
Fits great and really does offer tummy control
The bust padding is sewn in! That alone in women's swimwear is worth a 5 star review. It fits like the size guide and has well sewn hems. The bust is a little small for a D cup.
I was looking for full coverage for my post-partum body, and this was cute but didn’t have much give for my new odd shape.

This bathing suit fits perfectly, and color is as advertised. It's comfortable and I like that the top can be tied loose or tight as needed.  However, the "tummy control" is non-existent. There's some padding in the chest, but the rest of the suit is thin. Still, i love the vintage look and the bottoms don't ride up.
This is a great bathing suit. Very flattering and slimming and classy

I am 5' 6" and weigh 165 pounds. I ordered a medium and I'm glad that I did. It fits me well and I felt adorable in it. The fabric is good quality, not see through at all. The stitching seems well done. It is snug, so if you're not looking for a snug fit I would go with a large. It has a stretch around the legs and the middle in the material, doesn't ride up in the legs, and the tie straps do not come untied. The only thing that I wish was the torso was a bit longer or that it had more of vertical stretch ability. I have a long torso so the front didn't come up as high as I would like, but it's a personal preference.

I'm 3 months postpartum and am starting swim classes with my little one in a few weeks. I couldn't find one piece suit with full coverage bottoms to save my life. This suit fixed that! It's so comfortable and covered everything just like I wanted. It also has tummy control so that's nice and my favorite part is the cups are sewn in!!! Yay!!! I'm a size 6 and ordered the small and it fits perfect. Not too tight and not loose anywhere. This suit also does not cause 🐫 if you know what I mean.

I wanted a one piece swimming suit, but I hate the the bikini bottom kind.  I usually wear tankini kind with the bottoms that are shorts.  When I saw this suit thst gave me thr best if both worlds - one piece and shorts, I was like wow!  Wore it when I had family in town and got compliments saying it looked like something Marilyn Monroe would wear.  I love the color, the style and the fit.  I will definitely be ordering additional colors - since I live in a place with a resort style heated pool.

This swimsuit is flattering and well-made. The tummy control is excellent and the material does NOT ride up on the rear which is a plus. Although it has more coverage than the standard one piece, be prepared to receive lots of compliments.

I'm 5'8" and about 200 pounds and I bought an XL and I've never felt comfortable in a bathing suit. I bought another swimsuit similar to this and I didn't like it but this one is everything that I wanted. It fits perfect, and looks good in all of the right places. I really like how the cups are only lightly padded, so they don't look pointy or weird. I also don't like it when my butt hangs out of a bathing suit and the boyshorts are a huge win :)  I read hundreds of reviews on different swim suits that looked similar to this and I am so glad that I bought it. I'm so happy with it that I'm going to buy another one in a different color :)  Buy it. You won't regret it.
This is the first ever costume I have owned which is comfortable. Perfect for swimming, does not ride up (or down). Looks great. Highly recommended.
Very comfortable and flattering on.
I love this suit! The only thing is that it's not purple, more like a wine red color. I like that color so no harm done.
Size up! It’s very cute, comfortable, and hides everything you want but still looks fashionable!
Love this suit.  The ruching so helps holding in a poochie belly on an older lady.  Many compliments.  Can't say too much about it but, Wow
pretty comfy and it really snatches your curves

I’ve had a really hard time finding flattering, full coverage swimwear in my size. Even though I’m petite I’ve had 2 kids so I’m definitely looking for something that makes me feel secure and confident. This was very comfortable, slimming, and flattering in all the right places. The only downside is that it had a “uni-cheek” look in the butt if you know what I mean. A seam down the middle would’ve made it perfect. Otherwise very flattering. Very comfy. Will circle back at the end of summer to recap. Instagram: @christiana_sylvia
Love this bathing suit. Super slimming and true to size.
Great one piece and super comfy

Hello. This is my review of the bathing suit. I bought this for daughter for Easter. If you're getting this, get a size down. She's 15 and  The size chart is a little off. The first one come in. It was a little too big in the bust area, even though the size chart showed it being for her size. The materials really, really nice. This covers her really well. The shorts part of it could be a little bit longer. But all in all, it fits really, really nice on her. She likes it. It's not too revealing for me as a dad. So, win, win for daughter and for dad.
I think it runs small

评论概述: Wore the heck out of this!
评论详情: For those of us who are on the modest side, this is a great suit. The pros- style, fit, it stays put. Cons- the tie kind of hurts my neck to give the support I need up top, the tummy control is ok/fine. I also think I could’ve bought one size smaller but then my cups would’ve runneth over. For reference, I’m 5’4”, 120-125lbs, 34c, size 2 at the Gap/BR/Old Navy and have loose tummy flab, not a big pooch. It’s worth trying out just for the cute retro style.
This suit is great! It both hides my hip/thigh point and enhances my bust. Looks cute and retro. Love love love!
This product was amazing felt good and breathable

wow, ladies, this suit flatters! i recently gained 20lbs due to perimenopause and was not looking forward to trying to find a suit with ample coverage and comfort. i’ve always liked boy-leg underwear and wanted something to cover my ever growing derrière, so when i saw these suits, it was hard to not at least try. straight out of the box, i thought it wouldn’t fit; it looked so small. but it fit, with room to spare, and i was amazed at how flattered all the parts i was trying to hide. it’s soooo cute and retro. i stepped into my hallway from the bathroom and called my husband into the hall to see if i was just imagining things and he said, “WOW. You look like a pin-up girl from the 50s; I love it!” SOLD. i’m getting another color ASAP.

So impressed with this. True to size and the fit is amazing. Looks just as good or better than the pictures. The quality appears to be petty for a well. So glad I ordered. Going back for another in a different color. Very figure flattering.
I am 222lb and i ordered for size 18. Fits perfectly
True to size!! Snatched me in all the right places!! Didn’t rise up on my inner thighs! Cute suit!
This item was great! Looked great and fit was comfortable.

I wanted to love this bathing suit, it looks so cute in the picture. When I received it, the top part was way too small for my boobs but the rest fit. I tried to squish my top in but it didn’t work. I do have a large chest so my experience may be different. I was hoping it looked like the picture, but it just didn’t.

Very cute retro suit. I am petite and the polka dots mad me look like a clown unlike the cute retro girl I was imagining  I wish it was a little bit more halter/chest coverage. if I didn’t have it tied tight enough up top, my girls would totally pop out.
I am a older woman and love this suit.
This accentuates the best curves and minimizes others.  It was comfortable and easy to move in, I loved it!
5'1", 100lbs, 68yrs old. XS fits well.
The swimsuit was poorly made not true to size. Didn't  fit. Not for tall woman
Great support. Nice fit on. Great buy
Love it.  Fit perfectly.

This swim suit is comfortable and adorable. I have a bit of extra weight in my mid section and it is perfect for hiding it. My only complaint is the legs roll up and the line for the cups are a bit low. Other than that would completely recommend!!

评论概述: Terrible fit for this curvy girl
评论详情: Put emphasis on every bulge and curve. Was looking for the opposite. But if you have a nice shape it would be a comfy swimsuit for you.

评论概述: It is true to size, well made.
评论详情: I’m very happy with this item.  Fits perfectly..
I love this bathing suit. Shorts don't ride up and suit stays in place.

This suite gets sheer when stretched.  I tried sizing up but that was too large.  This also isn't very flattering if you have a tummy - it almost seems to emphasize it rather than hide it.  Would not recommend.
Very nice and comfortable fit.
Muy bonito
Looked a lot better than expected. It's a keeper and modern.
I really like the swim suit but wish the leg were a little longer down the thigh.  But over all it is nice.
Ordered for my teen. She loved it! It was very flattering and not too revealing. Great for her age and had enough coverage that you feel secure.

评论概述: Must run small. Arrived dirty and used.

I couldn’t wash my hands fast enough after putting it back in the flimsy package, it looks like a small instead of a large. I can’t believe I was mailed this item in this condition.
I bought an xl and fits me well. I am 5’3, 170 lbs and bra 38D. Happy with it

评论概述: Wouldn’t buy again…actually going to return it.
评论详情: Too big everywhere. Felt like it fit but when I went to the beach it looked like a dress. Too big up top. Couldn’t keep it up. Saggy in the bottom and the front. Very unflattering. I wanted to love it.

First time in YEARS that I’ve worn any kind of swim suit. We had a beach trip planned this year and I was determined that this year I was gonna have fun no matter what and not hid on the beach in shorts and be miserable. Well, this suit was it. Cute as can be and helped me feel a lot more confident.
No todos los vestidos de baño me gustan pero este me quedo súper bien y muy buena calidad , me encanto
When looking in the mirror at home- it looked great- I checked to make sure it was lined enough.  But in the sun? Ooof! Completely see thru, much to my embarrassment.

I truly love this swim suit. I wanted a modest yet cute swim suit and this is perfect! Fits perfect, holds well in the breast area, even if the tie isn't tight, which is great for your neck. Covers all the area in the rear department as well. Highly recommend.
